statements: DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 100 AND due_date = '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE plan = 'Gold' AND amount_due >= 50.00;
DELETE FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND payment_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM BillingInformation WHERE last_invoice_date < '2021-01-01' AND billing_address LIKE '%123 Main Street%';
DELETE FROM PaymentHistory WHERE amount_paid >= 1000.00 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM billing_info WHERE customer_id = 100 AND billing_status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM subscription_info WHERE subscription_id = 500 AND customer_id = 200;
